points.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data

case.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
case.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.

points.title: The service is transparent regarding government requests or inquiries that may involve user data.
points.analysis: Microsoft and Google taking positive steps on government requests: http://allthingsd.com/20130830/microsoft-and-google-will-sue-u-s-government-over-fisa-order-data/#!

case.title: The service is transparent regarding government requests or inquiries that may involve your data.
case.description: Weight was 30.

points.title: The service provides two factor authentication for your account

case.title: Two factor authentication is provided for your account
case.description: The service provides means of further securing your account with two factor authentification, thus greatly improving account security.

points.title: Prohibits the posting of pornographic content

case.title: The posting of pornographic content is prohibited
case.description: Users are not allowed to post any content of pornographic nature. This includes adult content, things that are sexually explicit, or obscene.

points.title: Microsoft may remotely disabled software you are not licensed to use.
points.analysis: Microsoft may remotely disable software you are not licensed to use.

case.title: The service disables software that you are not licensed to use.
case.description: The service disables software that you are not licensed to use.

points.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties

case.title: Information is gathered about you through third parties
case.description: This Service may employ, either identifiable or non-identifiable, data collection from third party sources about you.

points.title: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

case.title: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
case.description: The user agrees not to commit any unlawful acts through the use of the website, including the posting of illegal content or messaging.

points.title: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

case.title: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

points.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

case.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
case.description: This service makes no warranty regarding the accuracy or reliability of any information that is given on its website or the results that may be obtained from the use of the service.

points.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

case.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
case.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.

points.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

case.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
case.description: The service provider expressly does not claim to provide uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service.

points.title: Users agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content

case.title: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
case.description: This service prohibits users from submitting content of a variety of types. This can include content that is unlawful, harassing, abusive, threatening, libelous, sexist, racist, homophobic, transphobic, or discriminatory in any other way.

points.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet the users' expectations or requirements

case.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements
case.description: This service provider informs its users that the services, information, products, or other materials provided on its website may not meet the users' expectations or requirements.

points.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age

case.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
case.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.

points.title: This service prohibits users sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages

case.title: You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages
case.description: Users are not allowed to use the service for chain letters, junk mail, spamming or any other distribution of content to people who have not agreed to receiving it.

points.title: You waive your right to a class action.

case.title: You waive your right to a class action.
case.description: The right to be represented in a class action (or representative action) exists in the US and some European countries. It allows people who have been similarly injured by the same accused to take legal action by a single lawsuit instead of individually. Some Terms of Service try to limit that right. By agreeing to them, you could waive (= renounce to) your right to a class action, which might reduce your chances to be successful in a case.

points.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising

case.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising
case.description: The service employs your data to target ads to you, but you can opt-out of this interest-based advertising.

points.title: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes

case.title: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes
case.description: This service forces users to use their own contracted arbitrator and forces users to waive their rights to jury trial.

points.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data

case.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data
case.description: Location-based information is collected and may be used and/or shared with third parties for purposes not directly related to the services provided (i.e. the Service doesn't rely on the use or share of location data to function properly).

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
case.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
case.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.

points.title: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels

case.title: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels
case.description: These types of cookies/pixels send information to social media sites when you interact with the service.

points.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting and device fingerprinting

case.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
case.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.

points.title: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.

case.title: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
case.description: Even though the Do Not Track (DNT) header was not implemented perfectly, services should not track users whose browsers send a DNT header.

points.title: Your profile is combined across various products

case.title: Your profile is combined across various products
case.description: When using multiple services from one same company, they can combine these (unrelated) information sources about you to build up a single richer user profile about you.

points.title: Many different types of personal data are collected

case.title: Many different types of personal data are collected
case.description: The service collects different kinds of personal data, such as name, demographic information, postal address, biometric data, device information, IDs, contacts, call logs...

points.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

case.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
case.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.

points.title: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates

case.title: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates
case.description: Unless the service relies on Geo Location, this case is to be assigned to points that don't need your GPS coordinates to function properly.

points.title: Voice data is collected and shared with third-parties

case.title: Voice data is collected and shared with third-parties
case.description: The service collects data and recordings of your voice when you communicate with a service verbally and may use and share them with third parties, that may use this data for marketing or advertising.

points.title: Your personal data is used for advertising

case.title: Your personal data is used for advertising
case.description: Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites.

points.title: No promise to inform of government requests
points.analysis: Microsoft reserves the right at all times to disclose any information as Microsoft deems necessary to satisfy any applicable law, regulation, legal process or governmental request, or to edit, refuse to post or to remove any information or materials, in whole or in part, in Microsoft's sole discretion.

case.title: Your personal data may be disclosed to comply with government requests without notice to you
case.description: If the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they may not inform/notify the user while complying with the request.

points.title: The service can delete specific content without prior notice and without a reason

case.title: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice
case.description: This service can delete specific content. Usually they will claim they reserve the right to do it at their sole discretion, which is legalese for saying they won't give a specific reason. If the terms say they will not notify you, it shall be included in the quote but if it does not explicitly say they will give you a notice, it can be reasonably inferred that they can do it without telling you.

points.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

case.title: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes
case.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.

points.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

case.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
case.description: Your personal data is used for statistics in a de-identified/aggregated form (i.e. not directly linked to a unique identity) to analyse trends, for research and for analytics.

points.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

case.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk
case.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.

points.title: Harming minors in any ways is prohibited

case.title: Harming minors in any ways is prohibited
case.description: This service prohibits harming minor in any ways. Since both “minor” and “in any ways” are vague and can be cited to restrict possibly any actions, the case is not classified as “good”.

points.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason
points.analysis: If they (in their opinion) require some data to carry out a contract and you don't provide that data they can immediately close your account without prior notice. As the required personal data can be changed at any time and may not even be the same for all customers, this is basically a suspension loophole.

case.title: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason
case.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.
